creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Mersky
description: full-length silhouette of a female figure with hair flowing upward; grey ground; colored painterly lines around arms and legs with outwardly curved lines from hips to shins
medium: Photogram and acrylic pigments on auto-reversal paper
provenance: The artist, Kassel, Germany; [Von Lintel Gallery, Los Angeles, sold to Mersky 8/29/2017]; Robert B. Mersky, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2021.
title: Untitled (Korperfotogram 89)
